title: Poetry, Power and Loss in Theaster Gates’s Survey
description: Known for his social practice, performance, sculpture and work with archives, the Chicago artist memorializes those who shaped his worldview in his first major American museum survey.
dc:creator: Aruna D’Souza
category: Theaster Gates: Young Lords and Their Traces (Exhibit)
media:credit: Elliott Jerome Brown Jr. for The New York Times
media:description: Installation view of Theaster Gates’s exhibition “Young Lords and Their Traces” at the New Museum. About 40 sculptures, made between 2012 and 2022, are displayed in a manner that suggests a gathering or congregation.
